content:
after a long and restful winter break the UCSB womens rugby team kicks off regular season play at Arizona State on Jan PERIOD  PERIOD

After starting the preseason   with wins over Claremont McKenna UC Davis and Cal Poly  the Gauchos traveled to UC San Diego for a tournament and lost all three matches they played PERIOD

We went  in the preseason PERIOD But we actually won all three full games we played senior club President Phoebe Boone said PERIOD We had a really good preseason especially going to Davis and playing against teams up north PERIOD Its always good to play against teams out of your league PERIOD A lot of girls got a lot of playing time and we got to see what they could do. in addition to a few incoming freshmen the Gauchos have two players with accolades under their belts PERIOD Last summer five UCSB players were invited to a training camp for the SoCal Under23 Womens Rugby AllStar Team PERIOD Of that five two made it past the camp junior flyhalf Rosie Krauter and senior captain and eightman Blair Groefsema PERIOD Krauter made the National Development Training Camp and Groefsema was chosen to play for the National Under23 Eagles Womens Rugby practice group PERIOD

With the preseason experience of the newcomers and the summer play of Krauter and Groefsema the Gauchos are looking to start the regular season strong in the Southern California Rugby Football Union Division I PERIOD

There are only four of us in our league Arizona State UC San Diego and UCLA Boone said PERIOD The Sun Devils are our toughest competitors and UC San Diego has been a powerhouse for the last four to five years PERIOD They are a difficult team to beat. arizona State has won the conference championship four out of the past seven years PERIOD The Sun Devils have been to the Final Four once the Elite Eight once and the Sweet Sixteen twice since  PERIOD In that span they have also had at least one player named an AllAmerican every year PERIOD In the November San Diego tournament the Sun Devils got knocked out in the semifinals with a  loss to Chico State PERIOD They finished with two wins over UCLA Humboldt State and the Gauchos PERIOD

UC San Diego one of the Gauchos division competitors ended the  season as the only undefeated collegiate team on the Division I side of the Southern California Rugby Football Union PERIOD The undefeated record earned the club a  ranking by the American Rugby News PERIOD

UCLA a newcomer to Division I rugby has played at the collegiate level for two years PERIOD Last season the Bruins won the Division II championships in their first year of collegiate play PERIOD Before joining the collegiate ranks the Bruins had no affiliation with the university athletics PERIOD

In such a tough league UCSB looks to bank on its wellseasoned veterans and talented newcomers to put together a winning season PERIOD

Arizona State looks to be our strongest competition Boone said PERIOD They and UCSD field strong teams but after seeing them in November they look to be a really strong team so we have our work cut out for us. print

Comments are closed PERIOD

Forgetting to take off the ratty AF1s at the potluck most Asian households dont take kindly to shoes in the house

Wearing your only red tshirt to every final Red is a lucky color in many cultures especially Chinese cultures

Putting spiders in your friends wedding dress for good luck Has its origins in old english folklore and represents abundance for the couple

Accidentally summoned a ghost by leaving their chopsticks straight up A superstition that has Chinese origins because the chopsticks are reminiscent of funeral incense

Didnt like your friends significant other so they gifted them an umbrella The word for umbrella san sounds like the word for divorce in Chinese

Believing in horoscopes The modern western zodiac actually came from Babylonian astrology

Walked backwards in Portugal to live out the Faust fantasy In Portugal walking backwards allows the devil to know exactly where you are

Stole a raven from the tower of london as reparations According to UK superstition if there arent  ravens in the tower the kingdom will fall

Breaks a knuckle knocking on wood for good scores on finals Knocking on wood may have originated from the Celts and their love for tree spirits

Drunkenly rearranging their apartment for the feng shui at  AM A Chinese cultural practice that harmonizes a person with the energies of the environment around them

Left out their middle name on their taxes because the Fae run the IRS Giving the Fae your full name gives them power over you and the IRS has too much

Hit by a car but the license plate had an angel number Beyond just blowing up on TikTok angel numbers were invented by.. PERIOD Pythagoras
